ayas.arabic: حمٓ
ayas.translation: Ha Mim.
ayas.transliteration: ḥā mīm

ayas.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
ayas.translation: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ayas.transliteration: tanzīlul kitābi minallāhil `azīzil ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Most surely in the heavens and the earth there are signs for the believers.
ayas.transliteration: inna fis samāwāti wal-arḍi la-āyātin lil-mu-minīn

ayas.arabic: وَفِى خَلْقِكُمْ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُوقِنُونَ
ayas.translation: And in your (own) creation and in what He spreads abroad of animals there are signs for a people that are sure;
ayas.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wa mā yabuthhu min dābbatin āyātul liqawmiy yūqinūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱخْتِلَـٰفِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن رِّزْقٍ فَأَحْيَا بِهِ ٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا وَتَصْرِيفِ ٱلرِّيَـٰحِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And (in) the variation of the night and the day, and (in) what Allah sends down of sustenance from the cloud, then gives life thereby to the earth after its death, and (in) the changing of the winds, there are signs for a people who understand.
ayas.transliteration: wakhtilāfil layli wan nahāri wa mā anzalallāhu minas samā-i min rizqin fa-aḥyā bihil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā wataṣrīfir riyāḥi āyātul liqawmiy ya`qilūn

ayas.arabic: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتْلُوهَا عَلَيْكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَايَـٰتِهِۦ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: These are the communications of Allah which We recite to you with truth; then in what announcement would they believe after Allah and His communications?
ayas.transliteration: tilka āyātullāhi natlūhā `alayka bil ḥaqq ۖ fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin ba`dallāhi wa-āyātihi yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Woe to every sinful liar,
ayas.transliteration: waylul likulli affākin athīm

ayas.arabic: يَسْمَعُ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسْتَكْبِرًا كَأَن لَّمْ يَسْمَعْهَا ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Who hears the communications of Allah recited to him, then persists proudly as though he had not heard them; so announce to him a painful punishment.
ayas.transliteration: yasma`u āyātillāhi tutlā `alayhi thumma yuṣirru mustakbiran ka-an lam yasma`hā ۖ fabashhirhu bi`adhābin alīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا عَلِمَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا شَيْـًٔا ٱتَّخَذَهَا هُزُوًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
ayas.translation: And when he comes to know of any of Our communications, he takes it for a jest; these it is that shall have abasing chastisement.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā `alima min āyātinā shay-anit-takhadhahā huzuwā ۚ ulā-ika lahum `adhābun muhīn

ayas.arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُم مَّا كَسَبُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Before them is hell, and there shall not avail them aught of what they earned, nor those whom they took for guardians besides Allah, and they shall have a grievous punishment.
ayas.transliteration: min warā-ihim jahannam ۖ walā yughnī `anhum mā kasabū shay-an walā mat-takhadhū min dūnillāhi awliyā-a ۖ walahum `adhābun `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذَا هُدًى ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مِّن رِّجْزٍ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: This is guidance; and (as for) those who disbelieve in the communications of their Lord, they shall have a painful punishment on account of uncleanness.
ayas.transliteration: hādhā hudā ۖ wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyāti rabbihim lahum `adhābun min rijzin alīm

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلْبَحْرَ لِتَجْرِىَ ٱلْفُلْكُ فِيهِ بِأَمْرِهِۦ وَلِتَبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Allah is He Who made subservient to you the sea that the ships may run therein by His command, and that you may seek of His grace, and that you may give thanks.
ayas.transliteration: allāhul ladhī sakhhara lakumul baḥra litajriyal fulku fīhi bi-amrihi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi wala`allakum tashkurūn

ayas.arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا مِّنْهُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: And He has made subservient to you whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth, all, from Himself; most surely there are signs in this for a people who reflect.
ayas.transliteration: wasakhhara lakum mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi jamī`an minh ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yatafakkarūn

ayas.arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَغْفِرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ أَيَّامَ ٱللَّهِ لِيَجْزِىَ قَوْمًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Say to those who believe (that) they forgive those who do not fear the days of Allah that He may reward a people for what they earn.
ayas.transliteration: qul lilladhīna āmanū yaghfirū lilladhīna lā yarjūna ayyāmallāhi liyajziya qawman bimā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Whoever does good, it is for his own soul, and whoever does evil, it is against himself; then you shall be brought back to your-- Lord.
ayas.transliteration: man `amila ṣāliḥan falinafsih ۖ wa man asā-a fa`alayhā ۖ thumma ilā rabbikum turja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحُكْمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَفَضَّلْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: And certainly We gave the Book and the wisdom and the prophecy to the children of Israel, and We gave them of the goodly things, and We made them excel the nations.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā banī isrā-iylal-kitāba wal ḥukma wan nubuwwata warazaqnāhum minaṭ ṭayyibāti wafaḍḍalnāhum `alal-`ālamīn

ayas.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم بَيِّنَـٰتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ ۖ فَمَا ٱخْتَلَفُوٓا۟ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعِلْمُ بَغْيًۢا بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayas.translation: And We gave them clear arguments in the affair, but they did not differ until after knowledge had come to them out of envy among themselves; surely your -Lord will judge between them on the day of resurrection concerning that wherein they differed.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ātaynāhum bayyinātin minal-amr ۖ famakh-talafū illā min ba`di mā jā-ahumul `il-mu baghyan baynahum ۚ inna rabbaka yaqḍī baynahum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ فَٱتَّبِعْهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Then We have made you follow a course in the affair, therefore follow it, and do not follow the low desires of those who do not know.
ayas.transliteration: thumma ja`alnāka `alā sharī`atim minal-amri fattabi`hā walā tattabi` ahwā-al ladhīna lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ لَن يُغْنُوا۟ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayas.translation: Surely they shall not avail you in the least against Allah; and surely the unjust are friends of each other, and Allah is the guardian of those who guard (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: innahum lan yughnū `anka minallāhi shay-ā ۚ wa innaẓ ẓālimīna ba`ḍuhum awliyā-u ba`ḍ ۖ wallāhu waliyyul muttaqīn

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذَا بَصَـٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُوقِنُونَ
ayas.translation: These are clear proofs for men, and a guidance and a mercy for a people who are sure.
ayas.transliteration: hādhā baṣā-iru linnāsi wahudan waraḥmatun liqawmiy yūqinūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَرَحُوا۟ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجْعَلَهُمْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَوَآءً مَّحْيَاهُمْ وَمَمَاتُهُمْ ۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
ayas.translation: Nay! do those who have wrought evil deeds think that We will make them like those who believe and do good-- that their life and their death shall be equal? Evil it is that they judge.
ayas.transliteration: am ḥasibal ladhīnaj-taraḥus sayyi-āti an naj`alahum kal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti sawā-an maḥyāhum wa mamātuhum ۚ sā-a mā yaḥkumūn

ayas.arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And Allah created the heavens and the earth with truth and that every soul may be rewarded for what it has earned and they shall not be wronged.
ayas.transliteration: wakhalaqallāhus samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqqi walitujzā kullu nafsin bimā kasabat wahum lā yuẓlamūn

ayas.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ وَأَضَلَّهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِۦ وَقَلْبِهِۦ وَجَعَلَ عَلَىٰ بَصَرِهِۦ غِشَـٰوَةً فَمَن يَهْدِيهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: Have you then considered him who takes his low desire for his god, and Allah has made him err having knowledge and has set a seal upon his ear and his heart and put a covering upon his eye. Who can then guide him after Allah? Will you not then be mindful?
ayas.transliteration: afara ayta manit-takhadha ilāhahu hawāhu wa-aḍallahullāhu `alā `il-min wakhatama `alā sam`ihi waqalbihi waja`ala `alā baṣarihi ghishāwatan faman yahdīhi min ba`dillāh ۚ afalā tadhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا يُهْلِكُنَآ إِلَّا ٱلدَّهْرُ ۚ وَمَا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ
ayas.translation: And they say: There is nothing but our life in this world; we live and die and nothing destroys us but time, and they have no knowledge of that; they only conjecture.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū mā hiya illā ḥayātunad dunyā namūtu wanaḥyā wa mā yuhlikunā illad dahr ۚ wa mā lahum bidhālika min `il-m ۖ in hum illā yaẓunnūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ مَّا كَانَ حُجَّتَهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ ٱئْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: And when Our clear communications are recited to them, their argument is no other than that they say: Bring our fathers (back) if you are truthful.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin mā kāna ḥujjatahum illā an qālu-tū bi-ābā-inā in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُحْيِيكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يَجْمَعُكُمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: Allah gives you life, then He makes you die, then will He gather you to the day of resurrection wherein is no doubt, but most people do not know.
ayas.transliteration: qulillāhu yuḥyīkum thumma yumītukum thumma yajma`ukum ilā yawmil qiyāmati lā rayba fīhi walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَيَوْمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَخْسَرُ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And Allah's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and on the day when the hour shall come to pass, on that day shall they perish who say false things.
ayas.transliteration: walillāhi mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wayawma taqūmus sā`atu yawma-idhiy yakhsarul mubṭilūn

ayas.arabic: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٍ جَاثِيَةً ۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍ تُدْعَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ كِتَـٰبِهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And you shall see every nation kneeling down; every nation shall be called to its book: today you shall be rewarded for what you did.
ayas.transliteration: watarā kulla ummatin jāthiyah ۚ kullu ummatin tud`ā ilā kitābihal yawma tujzawna mā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: هَـٰذَا كِتَـٰبُنَا يَنطِقُ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا نَسْتَنسِخُ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: This is Our book that speaks against you with justice; surely We wrote what you did,
ayas.transliteration: hādhā kitābunā yanṭiqu `alaykum bil ḥaqq ۚ innā kunnā nastansikhu mā kuntum ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُدْخِلُهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayas.translation: Then as to those who believed and did good, their Lord will make them enter into His mercy; that is the manifest achievement.
ayas.transliteration: fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fayudkhiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatih ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَفَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَٱسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: As to those who disbelieved: What! were not My communications recited to you? But you were proud and you were a guilty people.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammal ladhīna kafarū afalam takun āyātī tutlā `alaykum fastakbartum wakuntum qawman mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهَا قُلْتُم مَّا نَدْرِى مَا ٱلسَّاعَةُ إِن نَّظُنُّ إِلَّا ظَنًّا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُسْتَيْقِنِينَ
ayas.translation: And when it was said, Surely the promise of Allah is true and as for the hour, there is no doubt about it, you said: We do not know what the hour is; we do not think (that it will come to pass) save a passing thought, and we are not at all sure.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā qīla inna wa`dallāhi ḥaqqun was sā`atu lā rayba fīhā qultum mā nadrī mas sā`atu in naẓunnu illā ẓannan wa mā naḥnu bimustayqinīn

ayas.arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayas.translation: And the evil (consequences) of what they did shall become manifest to them and that which they mocked shall encompass them.
ayas.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyi-ātu mā `amilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

ayas.arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱلْيَوْمَ نَنسَىٰكُمْ كَمَا نَسِيتُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا وَمَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And it shall be said: Today We forsake you as you neglected the meeting of this day of yours and your abode is the fire, and there are not for you any helpers:
ayas.transliteration: waqīlal-yawma nansākum kamā nasītum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā wa ma-wākumun nāru wa mā lakum min nāṣirīn

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذْتُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يُخْرَجُونَ مِنْهَا وَلَا هُمْ يُسْتَعْتَبُونَ
ayas.translation: That is because you took the communications of Allah for a jest and the life of this world deceived you. So on that day they shall not be brought forth from it, nor shall they be granted goodwill.
ayas.transliteration: dhālikum bi-annakumut-takhadhtum āyātillāhi huzuwan wagharratkumul ḥayātud dunyā ۚ fal yawma lā yukhrajūna minhā walā hum yusta`tabūn

ayas.arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْحَمْدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلْأَرْضِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: Therefore to Allah is due (all) praise, the Lord of the heavens and the Lord of the earth, the Lord of the worlds.
ayas.transliteration: falillāhil ḥamdu rabbis samāwāti warabbil-arḍi rabbil `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلْكِبْرِيَآءُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayas.translation: And to Him belongs greatness in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ayas.transliteration: walahul kibriyā-u fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
